Trade/Device Name(s): PTS PANELS Metabolic Chemistry Panel Test Strips
Regulation Name(s): Lipoprotein and cholesterol (high density lipoprotein) test systems
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Colorimetric enzymatic (glucose oxidase, cholesterol esterase/oxidase, glycerophosphate oxidase)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PTS PANELS Metabolic Chemistry Panel Test Strips for glucose, HDL cholesterol, and triglycerides measurement using dry chemistry reflectance photometry.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use by medical professionals and individuals at home to measure glucose, high density lipoprotein cholesterol, and triglycerides in fingerstick whole blood for the management and diagnosis of disorders related to carbohydrate and lipid metabolism.
